hero.name: Lauri Pitkänen
hero.headline: Engineering Manager @ Digia | AI & Automation
hero.tagline: I turn complex automation challenges into elegant, reliable systems—and help engineers do the best work of their careers.

highlight.title: Digia Award 2024
highlight.description: Recognized for continuous learning and embodying company values in leadership & software engineering.

experience.summary: Leading 16 engineers across 3 development teams in AI & Automation. Building high-trust teams that deliver complex enterprise automation solutions.

deepDive.context: Promoted to lead the AI & Automation unit after demonstrating technical excellence and leadership potential. Responsible for team performance, technical direction, and client relationships.
technicalHighlights: Architected PAM unemployment benefit system processing 70k+ applications annually
Established coding standards and review practices across all teams
Introduced AI-assisted development workflows improving team velocity
leadershipHighlights: Built and maintained team trust score of 4.8/5
Reduced team turnover to near-zero through engagement initiatives

experience.summary: Led technical delivery of flagship automation projects. Established best practices that became team standards.

deepDive.context: Joined as a senior developer and quickly became the technical lead for critical client projects. Focused on building reliable, maintainable automation systems.
technicalHighlights: Designed and implemented high-availability architecture achieving 99.99% uptime
Built reusable automation framework adopted across multiple projects
Introduced comprehensive testing practices reducing production incidents by 80%

experience.summary: Developed RPA automation solutions for enterprise clients. Built expertise in process automation and system integration.

deepDive.context: Transitioned from space industry to enterprise automation. Applied analytical skills from physics background to optimize business processes.
technicalHighlights: Developed Python-based automation pipelines for document processing
Built integrations between legacy systems and modern cloud services
Created reusable automation components reducing development time by 40%

experience.summary: Developed satellite data processing systems at a cutting-edge Finnish space technology company.

deepDive.context: Applied physics and programming expertise to space technology. Worked on ground segment software for SAR satellite constellation.
technicalHighlights: Built Python pipelines for satellite imagery processing
Developed algorithms for SAR data analysis and quality control
Contributed to ground station automation systems

experience.summary: Conducted quantum optics research while completing M.Sc. in Physics. Developed computational models for optical systems.

deepDive.context: Combined graduate studies with hands-on research experience. Specialized in theoretical and computational physics.
technicalHighlights: Developed Python simulations for quantum optical phenomena
Created data analysis pipelines for experimental physics data
Contributed to peer-reviewed publications in quantum optics

experience.summary: Taught physics laboratory courses and tutored undergraduate students in mathematics and physics.

deepDive.context: Developed teaching skills while pursuing graduate studies. Responsible for lab sessions and student support.
technicalHighlights: Led laboratory sessions for introductory physics courses
Developed teaching materials and exercise solutions
Mentored undergraduate students in research methods
leadershipHighlights: Developed effective teaching methodologies for complex concepts

experience.summary: Assisted in programming and mathematics courses while completing CS/Math studies.

deepDive.context: Early exposure to teaching and technical communication. Helped students master programming fundamentals.
technicalHighlights: Tutored students in Python, Java, and C programming
Assisted in discrete mathematics and algorithms courses
Developed automated grading scripts for programming assignments

philosophy.title: Complexity is the Enemy
philosophy.belief: Every line of code, every process, every meeting should justify its existence. Simplicity isn't about doing less—it's about enabling more.

philosophy.title: Impact Over Activity
philosophy.belief: I measure success by outcomes: hours saved, reliability achieved, confidence restored. Activity without impact is just motion.

philosophy.title: Quality as a Daily Practice
philosophy.belief: Quality isn't a phase or a gate—it's how you write every function, run every meeting, give every code review. Small disciplines compound.

roots.transferableInsight: Physics taught me to find simple models for complex phenomena. That skill transfers directly to software architecture and organizational design.

education.transferableInsight: Physics taught me to find simple models for complex phenomena. That skill transfers directly to software architecture and organizational design.
highlights: Specialized in quantum optics and laser physics
Developed computational models for optical systems

education.transferableInsight: Built the programming foundations and mathematical rigor that would later prove essential in both physics research and software engineering.
highlights: Strong foundation in algorithms and data structures
Programming in Python, Java, and C

volunteering.description: Mentoring aspiring developers in their journey from bootcamp to professional career.
volunteering.impact: Helped 12 mentees successfully transition into software development roles

volunteering.description: Presented physics demonstrations and workshops to engage public interest in science.
highlights: Led hands-on workshops for school students
Contributed to public understanding of science
